name: Binairo for Playdate
description:
Binairo is an easy to play and quick to learn logic puzzle. Fill the grid with ones and zeroes to win the game. Are you ready to put your mind to the test? Choose between 6x6 or 8x8 puzzle sizes and two different levels of difficulty: Easy or Hard.

Designed specifically for logic puzzle friends, this game will provide you with hours of mind training and relaxation.

HOW TO PLAY

  • The goal is to fill the grid with ones and zeroes
  • Each row and column must contain an equal number of ones and zeroes
  • No more than two ones or zeroes can be adjacent to one another
  • Each row/column must be unique, they cannot be filled in the same way
  • Each logic puzzle has a unique solution.

FEATURES

  • Clean design with simple yet challenging mechanics. Do you like Sudoku or Solitaire? Then Binairo is just right for you!
  • An interactive tutorial lets you learn the game in 2 minutes
  • You need help? Use hints to not only progress, but also to learn more and more new techniques
  • Adjust the design to your needs with many themes: 1️⃣/0️⃣, ⚪️/⚫️, ⬜️/⬛️, ...
  • Play 6x6 or 8x8 puzzles, each with two different levels of difficulty
  • Solve logic problems on your Playdate 🟨 and train your brain! Keep your mind active playing this game any time, any place.
  • These puzzles will help you to forget everyday life and switch off properly. Whether you're on your way to work or taking a short break.

CONTROLS

  Moves the cursor to the desired position in the grid.

 If the cursor is in an empty cell, you can set zero with the A button. Pressing again replaces zero with one. Press again to clear the cell content.

  You can request a hint with the B button or the crank. You can display the explanation step by step with the A button.

HOW TO INSTALL

Take a break and solve addictive puzzle games. Exercise your mind and have fun with Binairo!
